# Q014 Diagram Labels
^question Q014
^type text_entry_graphic
^identifier TEG_Q001
^title Fill in Diagram Labels
^points 3
^labels #Biology #Cells #Apply #Medium

@field: question_text
Fill in the names of the labeled parts on the cell diagram.
@end_field

@field: image_config
^Background_image cell_diagram.png
@end_field

@field: fields

@@field: field_1
^Position 100,150
^Size 80x30
^Correct_Answers
- Mitochondria
- mitochondria
^Case_Sensitive No
@@end_field

@@field: field_2
^Position 250,100
^Size 60x30
^Correct_Answers
- Nucleus
- nucleus
^Case_Sensitive No
@@end_field

@@field: field_3
^Position 50,300
^Size 100x30
^Correct_Answers
- Cell membrane
- cell membrane
- Membrane
^Case_Sensitive No
@@end_field

@end_field

@field: scoring
^Points_per_correct_field 1
^Points_minimum 0
@end_field

@field: feedback

@@field: general_feedback

@@end_field

@@field: correct_feedback

@@end_field

@@field: incorrect_feedback

@@end_field

@@field: partial_feedback

@@end_field

@@end_field

@end_field
